## Pull Request Checklist

Please confirm the following before submitting:

- [ ] **Follows plan files only** - No extra docs, tests, or folders beyond build plan
- [ ] **No secrets committed** - Checked for API keys, tokens, or credentials in code
- [ ] **CHANGELOG updated** - Added conventional commit entry to `docs/CHANGELOG.md`
- [ ] **Screenshots/notes added** - For UI changes, attached screenshot or screen recording
